name: Soothing Melody
simple_desc: Increases the ATK of a single ally and grants them Benediction. Ally with Benediction additionally deals minor Lightning Additional DMG when attacking.
desc:
Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by #2[i]%, up to #4[i]% of Tingyun's current ATK.
When the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of that ally's ATK for 1 time.
Benediction lasts for #3[i] turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.
